_header: O cruel death painful and smart
Subjects: death; complaints; dialogues, death and man
_description: James Ryman, a complaint against Death and Death’s reply — seven stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O cruell deth paynfull & smertOn the to thenke my hert is
                    colde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That was & is and ay shall beEternall god in persones
                    thre
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
